sense.def:
Kadar nekaj mehkega, krhkega ali starega
crumbles
, razpade na veliko majhnih koščkov.

seg.quote: The bread crumbled in my fingers.
The flakes can be easily crumbled into small pieces.
The villages are crumbling into ruin.

sense.def:
Kadar neka družba, organizacija ali zveza
crumbles
, je neuspešna in propade.
